EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne2GX_Customer Reception_Q315.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal's SpringOne 2GX Customer Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, September 16, 2015 Marriott Marquis
Mezzanine Foyer, 2nd Floor
7 - 9 PM
Washington, DC 20001 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/spring-one-reception?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-reception-q315> SpringOne 2GX Customer Reception We are excited that you are joining us at the SpringOne conference next week!
In addition to some really cool and information sessions, Pivotal is hosting a private customer appreciation event on Wednesday, Sept 16 and we'd like you to join us! Come hang out with other customers and our partners for an evening filled with networking, local brews, music and food. Register now <http://pivotal.io/event/spring-one-reception?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-reception-q315> to let us know you're coming.
Remember to visit us at the Pivotal Lounge throughout the conference and participate in demos such as Spring Cloud Services, Cloud Foundry Retail and IoT & Connected Car. With a wide range of topics offered this year, be sure to not miss these highlighted sessions:
- Getting Started with Spring Cloud <https://2015.event.springone2gx.com/schedule/sessions/getting_started_with_spring_cloud.html> - Spring Cloud at Netflix <https://2015.event.springone2gx.com/schedule/sessions/spring_cloud_at_netflix.html> - Message Driven Microservices <https://2015.event.springone2gx.com/schedule/sessions/message_driven_microservices_in_the_cloud.html> in the Cloud - Spring XD <https://2015.event.springone2gx.com/schedule/sessions/spring_xd_today_and_tomorrow.html> Today and Tomorrow
See you next week!
The Pivotal Team
